name: Achelous
trait: The patron god of the “silver-swirling” Achelous River.

name: AEOLUS
trait: God of the winds and air

name: AETHER
trait: Primordial god of the upper air, light, the atmosphere, space and heaven.

name: ALASTOR
trait: God of family feuds and avenger of evil deeds.

name: APOLLO
trait: Olympian god of music, poetry, art, oracles, archery, plague, medicine, sun, light and knowledge.

name: ARES
trait: God of war. Represented the physical, violent and untamed aspect of war.

name: ARISTAEUS
trait: Minor patron god of animal husbandry, bee-keeping, and fruit trees. Son of Apollo.

name: ASCLEPIUS
trait: God of medicine, health, healing, rejuvenation and physicians.

name: ATLAS
trait: The Primordial Titan of Astronomy. Condemned by Zeus to carry the world on his back after the Titans lost the war.

name: ATTIS
trait: A minor god of vegetation, fruits of the earth and rebirth.

name: BOREAS
trait: A wind god (Anemoi) and god of the cold north wind and the bringer of winter. Referred to as “The North Wind”.

name: CAERUS
trait: Minor god of opportunity, luck and favorable moments.

name: CASTOR
trait: One of the twins, Castor and Pollux, known as Dioskouri. Zeus transformed them into the constellation Gemini

name: CERUS
trait: The large and powerful wild bull tamed by Persephone and turned into the Taurus constellation.

name: CHAOS
trait: The nothingness that all else sprung from. A god who filled the gap between Heaven and Earth and created the first beings Gaia, Tartarus, Uranus, Nyx and Erebos.

name: CHARON
trait: The Ferryman of Hades. Took the newly dead people across the rivers Styx and Acheron to the Greek underworld if they paid him three obolus (a Greek silver coin).

name: CRONOS
trait: The god of time. Not to be confused with Cronus, the Titan father of Zeus.

name: CRIOS
trait: The Titan god of the heavenly constellations and the measure of the year..

name: CRONUS
trait: God of agriculture, leader and the youngest of the first generation of Titans and father of the Titans. Not to be confused with Cronos, god of time.

name: DINLAS
trait: Guardian god of the ancient city Lamark, where wounded heroes could find comfort and heal after battle. He was the son of Aphrodite.

name: DEIMOS
trait: Deimos is the personification of dread and terror.

name: DIONYSUS
trait: An Olympian god of the grape harvest, winemaking and wine, of ritual madness, religious ecstasy and theatre.

name: EREBUS
trait: Primordial god of darkness.

name: EROS
trait: God of sexual desire, attraction, love and procreation.

name: EURUS
trait: One of the wind god known as Anemoi and god of the unlucky east wind. Referred to as “The East Wind”.

name: GLAUCUS
trait: A fisherman who became immortal upon eating a magical herb, an Argonaut who may have built and piloted the Argo, and became a god of the sea.

name: HADES
trait: God of the Dead and Riches and King of the Underworld.

name: HELIOS
trait: God of the Sun and also known as Sol.

name: HEPHAESTUS
trait: God of fire, metalworking, stone masonry, forges and the art of sculpture. Created weapons for the gods and married to Aphrodite.

name: HERACLES
trait: The greatest of the Greek heroes, he became god of heroes, sports, athletes, health, agriculture, fertility, trade, oracles and divine protector of mankind. Known as the strongest man on Earth.

name: HERMES
trait: God of trade, thieves, travelers, sports, athletes, and border crossings, guide to the Underworld and messenger of the gods.

name: HESPERUS
trait: The Evening Star – the planet VENUS in the evening.

name: HYMENAIOS
trait: God of marriage ceremonies, inspiring feasts and song.

name: HYPNOS
trait: The god of sleep.

name: KRATOS
trait: God of strength and power.

name: MOMUS
trait: God of satire, mockery, censure, writers and poets and a spirit of evil-spirited blame and unfair criticism.

name: MORPHEUS
trait: God of dreams and sleep – has the ability to take any human form and appear in dreams.

name: NEREUS
trait: The Titan god of the sea before Poseidon and father of the Nereids (nymphs of the sea).

name: NOTUS
trait: Another Anemoi (wind god) and god of the south wind. Known as “The South Wind”.

name: OCEANUS
trait: Titan god of the ocean. Believed to be the personification of the World Ocean, an enormous river encircling the world.

name: ONEIROI
trait: Black-winged daimons that personified dreams.

name: PAEAN
trait: The physician of the Olympian gods.

name: PALLAS
trait: The Titan god of warcraft and of the springtime campaign season.

name: PAN
trait: God of nature, the wild, shepherds, flocks, goats, mountain wilds, and is often associated with sexuality. Also a satyr (half man, half-goat).

name: PHOSPHORUS
trait: The Morning Star – THE PLANET VENUS as it appears in the morning.

name: PLUTUS
trait: The god of wealth.

name: POLLUX
trait: Twin brother of Castor, together known as the Dioskouri, that were transformed into the constellation Gemini.

name: PONTUS
trait: ancient, pre-Olympian sea-god of the deep sea, one of the primordial deities and son of Gaia.

name: POSEIDON
trait: Olympian god of the sea, earthquakes, storms, and horses.

name: PRIAPUS
trait: Minor rustic fertility god, protector of flocks, fruit plants, bees and gardens and known for having an enormous penis.

name: PRICUS
trait: The immortal father of sea-goats, made into the Capricorn constellation.

name: PROMETHEUS
trait: Titan god of forethought and crafty counsel who was given the task of moulding mankind out of clay.

name: PRIMORDIAL
trait: A group of gods that came before all else.

name: TARTARUS
trait: The god of the deep abyss, a great pit in the depths of the underworld, and father of Typhon.

name: THANATOS
trait: A minor god and the god of death.

name: TRITON
trait: Messenger of the sea and the son of Poseidon and Amphitrite.

name: TYPHON
trait: The deadliest MONSTER in Greek mythology and “Father of All Monsters”. Last son of Gaia, fathered by Tartarus and god of monsters, storms, and volcanoes. He challenged Zeus for control of Mount Olympus.

name: URANUS
trait: Primordial god of the sky and heavens, and father of the Titans.

name: ZELUS
trait: The god of dedication, emulation, eager rivalry, envy, jealousy, and zeal.

name: ZEPHYRUS
trait: A wind god (Anemoi). God of the west wind and known as “The West Wind”.

name: ZEUS
trait: God of the sky, lightning, thunder, law, order, justice, King of the Gods and the “Father of Gods and men”
